description: CircuitHub is on a mission to fix rapid electronics prototyping. We are the first automated electronics factory built around a modern tech stack. We help hardware companies producing self-driving cars, satellites, 3D printers, robotics, & more to rapidly prototype electronics and get to market faster.
generated_description:
**CircuitHub Overview**

Founded in 2012 as part of the Y Combinator Batch W12, CircuitHub is revolutionizing the world of electronics manufacturing by offering an automated approach to PCB assembly and prototyping. Located in London, UK, the company focuses on streamlining the rapid prototyping process for hardware companies engaged in cutting-edge fields such as autonomous vehicles, satellites, 3D printing, and robotics.

**Mission**

At its core, CircuitHub is on a mission to enhance electronics factory automation. The vision is simple yet powerful: enable hardware developers to get their prototypes and finished products to market faster and more efficiently.

**Key Features**

1. **Automated Manufacturing:** CircuitHub operates the first automated electronics factory built around a modern tech stack, allowing it to offer faster turnaround times—81% of full turnkey orders ship within three days.

2. **Cost-Effective Solutions:** Unlike traditional manufacturers, CircuitHub leverages automation to significantly lower costs associated with low-volume prototypes and small batch production.

3. **Real-Time Data Transparency:** For the first time in the industry, CircuitHub publishes key performance indicators in real-time, providing clients with transparency they can count on.

4. **Shared Inventory:** The platform enables clients to manage over 35,000 common parts and also provides the option to stock unique components, simplifying the ordering process and reducing lead time.

5. **Efficient Order Management:** The CircuitHub platform allows users to upload PCB files directly, instantly receive quotes, and track order status—eliminating the frustrating back-and-forth usually associated with PCB manufacturing.

**Team & Growth**

CircuitHub has a dedicated team of 58 employees working to achieve its vision, ensuring a blend of technical expertise and customer service. The company's growth is evidenced by the staggering statistics: over 1.57 million boards delivered and 87.4 million parts placed.

**Why Choose CircuitHub?**

Customer testimonials flood in, attesting to CircuitHub’s quality, speed, and customer support. Clients rave about how easy it is to get prototypes made, highlighting the platform’s instant quoting, CAD file handling, and overall efficiency. This has made CircuitHub a favored partner for innovation-driven companies who want to stay ahead of the curve without sacrificing quality or speed.

**Connect with CircuitHub**

For those looking to dive deeper into their capabilities or get started with a project, CircuitHub offers direct contact options and a plethora of resources available on their website: [circuitHub.com](https://circuithub.com).

If you're in hardware development and need rapid prototyping that's reliable and cost-effective, CircuitHub might just be the game-changer you’ve been searching for.
headline: Electronics factory automation
name: CircuitHub

description:
CleverDeck is a customizable-spaced repetition flashcard application for learning foreign language vocabulary.

It contains more than three thousand useful words along with images, native speaker audio, and example sentences.
generated_description:
# CleverDeck: Your Language Learning Companion

**Website**: [CleverDeck.com](http://cleverdeck.com)  
**Location**: Istanbul, Turkey  
**Founded**: Y Combinator Batch W12  

### Mission
At its core, CleverDeck is about collaboration and creativity, aiming to commission original artwork from artists to enrich your learning experience. 

### What is CleverDeck?
Originally launched as a customizable spaced repetition flashcard app, CleverDeck is designed to help users learn foreign language vocabulary effectively. With a user-friendly interface and robust features, it now hosts over 3,000 common words across various languages, complemented by images, native speaker audio, and contextual example sentences.

### Key Features
- **Extensive Content**: Access a range of decks for popular languages like Spanish, French, German, Chinese, and more.
- **Adaptive Learning**: CleverDeck employs the SM-2 algorithm for spaced repetition, meaning you'll focus more on words you struggle with and less on those you have mastered.
- **Device Syncing**: Your learning progress is automatically synced between devices.
- **Customization**: Tailor your learning experience by adjusting algorithms, notifications, and scheduling based on your preferences.
- **Offline Functionality**: Download content for use without an internet connection, ideal for trips.
- **Competitive Pricing**: Free access to your own content creation, and a premium for $3/month grants access to all premium decks—enough to see if it’s worth your investment.

### Future Plans
CleverDeck currently has a small team of one—presumably the founder Justin—who openly acknowledges the limitations of resources for developing an Android version. However, there is hope that an Android app will blossom down the line.

### Why Choose CleverDeck?
By marrying innovative technology with expert-sourced content, CleverDeck not only streamlines language acquisition but does so in a way that respects the user's time and investment. Their functional design fosters a unique learning environment where creativity and practicality coexist.

Whether you’re a traveler prepping for your next adventure or someone wanting to enhance your language skills, CleverDeck offers a pathway to effective and enjoyable learning. Go on, check it out—you might just find your new favorite tool!
headline: Collaborate with an artist to commission original artwork you'll liveâ¦
name: CleverDeck

description:

We're a modern staffing agency that uses work samples and video assessments to generate deeper insight & connect contractors to companies where they'll thrive.

Our graders and account managers individually assess each candidate on culture fit, experience, and communication skills. The proof is in the talent: our candidates have filled roles at leading start-up and technology companies like Facebook, Airbnb, and Waymo. 

We put people first, from our candidates to our clients, we believe in the power of transparent hiring.

Learn more about our team and our platform at HireArt.com.
generated_description:
**HireArt: Redefining Contract Workforce Management**

Founded in 2012 and originally known as Hire Smarter, HireArt has evolved into a modern staffing agency that specializes in connecting businesses with W2 contractors. Situated in New York and part of the Y Combinator W12 batch, HireArt operates with a clear mission: to provide companies everything they need to hire and manage their contractor workforce efficiently.

At the heart of HireArt's approach is a commitment to transparency and empathy. The company believes that effective hiring should involve more than just a resumé. They use innovative methods like work samples and video assessments to evaluate candidates, ensuring a deeper insight into culture fit, experience, and communication skills. This approach has proven successful, with their candidates finding roles at prominent companies such as Facebook, Airbnb, and Waymo.

HireArt employs a dedicated team of 90 professionals who assess candidates to ensure the right match for the right company. Their key offerings include:

- **Vendor Management:** A robust system to manage suppliers.
- **Employer of Record:** A modern solution for the employment complexities facing today’s workforce.
- **Program Management:** Comprehensive management of contract workforce programs.
- **Sourcing & Recruitment:** Streamlined tools to fill contract roles efficiently.
- **Worker Classification and Compliance:** Robust features to minimize classification risks and ensure compliance with employment laws.

The company's innovative platform caters to various stakeholders, including HR leaders, hiring managers, procurement teams, and talent acquisition specialists. They focus on understanding the unique needs of each group, allowing for tailored solutions that boost operational efficiency.

HireArt's impact is evident through its impressive net promoter scores—77.3 for contractors and 86.4 for clients, which starkly contrasts with traditional staffing service averages. Their case studies illustrate significant successes, like helping Zoox consolidate 88 contract workers under a single employer of record while maintaining a 90% retention rate.

In a world where the nature of work is rapidly changing, HireArt stands out by putting people first. Their platform not only simplifies the complex hiring landscape but also fosters an environment where both contractors and employers can thrive.

For more details about their services or to see how HireArt can assist your organization, visit their website: [HireArt.com](http://hireart.com).

description:
Have you ever wondered why it's so hard for physicians to communicate quickly and why the leading cause of preventable death is still a delay in communication? Our team has built the solution for this. Medigram is a team of tier 1 health system CxO IT executives, technologists, SaaS exec, physicians, engineers, and data experts. We have developed a breakthrough service for the medical industry to save lives and for hospitals to make millions per year. Medigram instantly flags insights from clinician chats for immediate insight into hospital operations and patient care. This reduces critical response times by 50%. We've designed this system to provide instant, reliable messaging (including images and audio files) across very complicated network environments in hospitals. Medigram is secure, designed for HIPAA, and a full stack system which includes database back end, middleware, logic, and client apps for iOS, Android, desktop, and the web.

Our solution to this is Mobile Intelligence For Healthcare by providing a secure, intelligent workflow management platform for the patient care ecosystem and medical professionals. Within the healthcare environment, you have physicians, the patient care team, EMR, workflow, data, and administration which needs to be tied together with intelligence through Medigram.
generated_description:
**Overview of Medigram**

Medigram is an innovative technology company based in Los Gatos, CA, focused on transforming communication in the healthcare sector. Founded as part of Y Combinator’s Batch W12, this start-up emerged from a critical observation: the noticeable delays in communication among physicians are a leading cause of preventable deaths. Medigram is addressing this challenge head-on by creating a secure, HIPAA-compliant messaging application tailored specifically for medical professionals, resembling the functionalities of a group messaging app like GroupMe.

**Mission and Vision**

At its core, Medigram's mission is straightforward: to make healthcare communication faster and safer. It aims to drastically reduce critical response times by up to 50%, thereby enhancing patient care and hospital operations. The team comprises a diverse group of experts including IT executives, technologists, physicians, and engineers, all united by a common vision—to tie together various fragmented elements of healthcare (physicians, patient care teams, EMRs, and more) into an intelligent workflow management platform.

**What Makes Medigram Unique?**

1. **HIPAA Compliance & Security:** Understanding the importance of patient confidentiality, Medigram is designed from the ground up with compliance and security woven into all layers of its solution. This paves the way for a dependable communication platform in hospitals where other apps might fail.

2. **Mobile Intelligence:** Medigram’s application supports instant messaging, audio, and image sharing across various devices—smartphones, tablets, and computers—making it readily accessible to clinicians wherever they are.

3. **Rapid Insights:** The platform not only facilitates communication but also actively analyzes clinician interactions to deliver immediate insights that can improve hospital operations and patient care.

4. **Team Expertise:** The leadership team, which includes seasoned professionals with backgrounds in healthcare IT and clinical practice, brings invaluable industry knowledge, ensuring the platform effectively meets the demands of medical environments.

**The Bigger Picture**

In a sector where time is often a matter of life and death, Medigram is dedicated to building a robust infrastructure that ensures healthcare professionals can connect swiftly and securely. By simplifying communication, Medigram is not just enhancing efficiency; it's driving better patient outcomes and supporting healthcare systems in achieving financial sustainability.

Excited about the potential Medigram holds? You can explore more via their website at [medigram.com](http://medigram.com).

In essence, Medigram is not just another tech company; it’s a mission-driven venture looking to fundamentally change the way doctors communicate, mitigating the risks associated with delays in critical care. As they expand, keep an eye on their influence in the broader healthcare landscape—it's bound to be significant.

description:
Medmonk is a technology platform that helps fight non-adherence. It enables pharmacists to provide financial assistance to patients who are unable to pay for their medications. We partner with pharmaceutical companies, pharmacies, physicians, and health plans to improve outcomes by promoting access to chronic therapy.

Medmonk is based on the premise that it's in everyone's best interest for medications to be used regardless of price. Patients get the care they need, insurers are protected against larger claims, and pharmaceutical companies and pharmacies get maximum use of their medications.
generated_description:
### Medmonk: Revolutionizing Patient Access to Medications

**Overview**  
Medmonk is a cutting-edge technology platform based in Milpitas, CA, that tackles the critical issue of medication non-adherence. Its mission is clear: help pharmacists find funding solutions for patients who struggle to afford their medications. By partnering with various stakeholders—including pharmaceutical companies, pharmacies, and healthcare providers—Medmonk works to ensure that patients have access to the chronic therapies they need, regardless of their ability to pay.

**How It Works**  
Why is Medmonk’s approach so impactful? The underlying premise is simple yet powerful: when patients get the medications they need, everyone benefits. Patients receive essential care, insurers can avoid higher claims costs, and pharmaceutical companies and pharmacies see better medication utilization. This triad of positive outcomes makes a strong case for Medmonk’s innovative model.

**Services Offered**  
Medmonk offers a suite of solutions aimed at improving the patient's journey through the healthcare system:

- **Hub Services**: Streamlining support systems for patients.
- **Automated Enrollment**: Enabling quick patient enrollment in assistance programs.
- **Copay Assistance**: Helping patients manage upfront costs.
- **Patient Assistance Programs (PAP)**: Assisting patients who qualify for financial aid.
- **Non-Commercial Pharmacy Solutions**: Direct access to medications without commercial barriers.
- **Data Analytics**: Utilizing insights to optimize patient access strategies.

One of Medmonk's standout features is its expertise in rare disease therapies, where the team understands the unique challenges these patients face and tailors services accordingly.

**Network and Collaboration**  
With connections to around 98% of pharmacies and healthcare facilities nationwide, Medmonk ensures a seamless flow of resources and information. Their platform's integration capabilities simplify the enrollment processes significantly, aiming for patient enrollment in mere seconds—under three, to be exact.

**Success Stories**  
Testimonials from brand managers and patients alike highlight Medmonk's efficacy. From easing the path of rare disease treatments at the point of care to assisting patients in navigating insurance complexities, the stories emphasize the real-world impact Medmonk has on patient lives.

**Team and Background**  
Founded as part of Y Combinator's W12 batch, Medmonk operates with a lean team of just two employees, showcasing the potential of focused operations within a critical sector like healthcare.

**Conclusion**  
In an era where access to healthcare can often feel like a luxury, Medmonk stands out as a beacon of innovation. By prioritizing medication accessibility and patient support, they're not just improving outcomes—they're redefining how we think about healthcare accessibility. If you’re interested in joining their mission or learning more, you can visit their website at [Medmonk](http://medmonk.com).
headline: A tool for pharmacists to find funding for patients who are unable toâ¦
name: Medmonk

description:
Per Vices builds the highest performing Software Defined Radios for mission critical applications for industries that can't live without them. Our products are modular, easy to use, provide the best possible performance, and replace a number complex sub-systems and components. 

Customers developing wireless applications use our products because they dramatically lower integration and development complexity, total cost of ownership, and time to market. Our proprietary, industry leading, technology provides the best performance and maintains an efficient abstraction layer that allows customers to easily incorporate our product into their application.

generated_description:
**Per Vices: A Summary**

Founded in 2005 and part of Y Combinator's W12 batch, Per Vices operates out of Toronto, Canada. With a small team of 11 dedicated employees, they specialize in building high-performance Software Defined Radio (SDR) products that cater to mission-critical applications across various industries, including telecommunications and IoT.

**Mission and Vision**

Per Vices leverages its expertise to design modular and easy-to-use SDR systems that not only enhance performance but also streamline the integration process for customers. Their products are aimed at reducing the complexity and costs associated with traditional wireless applications, providing a competitive edge in terms of time to market.

**Core Products**

The company has developed several standout SDR platforms:
- **Crimson TNG**: A flexible platform designed for high bandwidth communications and capable of tuning from near DC to 6 GHz.
- **Cyan**: Known for its high channel count and extensive tuning range up to 18 GHz, this platform supports multiple independent radio channels.
- **Chestnut**: Balancing performance and cost, this model offers extended tuning and high digital throughput.
- **Calamine**: Offers the highest tuning range, reaching up to 40 GHz, suitable for applications demanding precision and flexibility.

**Market Applications**
Per Vices supplies their SDR products to a diverse range of applications, including radar, GPS/GNSS, medical imaging, electronic warfare, and more. Their technology is pivotal for customers ranging from government agencies to commercial enterprises, helping them meet regulatory approvals while maintaining performance and cost-effectiveness.

**Customer-Centric Approach**
The company prides itself on its integration support and collaboration with clients to customize solutions that meet specific project requirements. Feedback from notable partners underscores their commitment to quality and responsiveness, showcasing the reliability of their products in demanding environments.

**Conclusion**
Per Vices stands as a leader in the realm of software-defined radios, providing cutting-edge solutions that simplify wireless communications while offering superior performance. With a focus on continuous innovation and customer satisfaction, they are positioned well for future growth in a rapidly evolving telecommunications landscape.

For more information, visit their website: [Per Vices](https://www.pervices.com)
headline: Building Mission Critical Software Defined Radio products.
name: Per Vices

We democratize access to the latest technologies that drive greater efficiency and competitiveness, including high performance computing, simulation, modeling, AI/ML, and digital twins.

The majority of industry leaders worldwide use Rescale as the backbone of R&D, connecting the digital thread of new product innovation to develop products that enrich humanity, from autonomous vehicles to drug discovery. Rescale customers include 7 of the top 10 automotive companies and 3 of the top 6 life science companies.

Rescale’s full-stack, open platform automates systems, data, and workflows into a user-centric experience, so customers can focus on innovation. Choose from 1000+ pre-installed applications for multiphysics simulation and AI/ML-assisted design exploration, including commercial, open-source, and custom software. We offer the largest global network of hyperscale and specialty cloud infrastructure to leverage the latest CPU, GPU, and other specialized architectures.

Rescale is enterprise-ready to enable any size organization to achieve their digital transformation goals–with unified management that gives IT teams full visibility and control of hybrid-cloud operations. Rescale’s intelligent automation gives customers flexibility to improve performance and reduce costs of computing, while our enhanced security and compliance ensures industry-leading standards are met from end to end.

description:
Screenleap allows you to share your screen and view it from any web-enabled device without installing any software. Our mission is to do for screen sharing what Dropbox did for file sharing: make screen sharing a hassle-free experience that just works across all devices.

We also allow developers to add screen sharing to their applications using our API (http://www.screenleap.com/api). Our screen sharing service has been integrated into a variety of products and services ranging from audio-conferences services to e-learning platforms, sales tools, and support applications.

generated_description:
**Screenleap Overview**

Founded in 2011 and part of Y Combinator's W12 batch, Screenleap is a dynamic company based in San Carlos, California, with a lean team of four. Their mission is straightforward yet ambitious: to enable one-click screen sharing without the hassle of installation, much like how Dropbox revolutionized file sharing. 

**Core Offerings**

Screenleap allows users to share their screens or cameras instantly on any device equipped with a web browser—no downloads necessary. This platform stands out for its installation-free viewing, which caters to a wide range of users, from corporate teams needing to collaborate remotely to educators conducting online classes. Their services include:

- **Screen Sharing:** Share your entire screen or just an application window quickly, without software installations.
- **Video and Audio Conferencing:** Engage with participants using two-way audio and video support, facilitating a complete conference experience.
- **Easy Integration:** Developers can seamlessly integrate Screenleap’s functionalities into their own applications via their API, enhancing tools like e-learning platforms, CRM systems, and sales tools.
- **Collaboration Features:** Users can share control over their screens, allowing viewers to interact without needing to install anything.
- **Cloud Recording:** Meetings can be recorded effortlessly, enabling users to share follow-up content without extra steps.

Screenleap also prioritizes customer engagement by allowing viewer registration, thereby helping businesses capture leads and follow up effectively.

**Reputation and Feedback**

The platform enjoys a strong reputation, with users frequently praising its simplicity and efficiency. It holds an impressive 4.5/5 rating based on 445 reviews, a testament to its reliability and user experience.

**Where to Find Them**

To see Screenleap in action or learn more about pricing and sign-up, visit their website at [screenleap.com](https://screenleap.com). Whether you’re looking to enhance remote collaboration, conduct engaging online meetings, or integrate screen sharing into your existing applications, Screenleap offers a solution that’s user-friendly, effective, and quick to deploy. 

In the evolving landscape of digital collaboration, Screenleap is not just another tool; it's an essential innovation that makes screen sharing as effortless as it should be.
headline: One-click screen sharing with installation-free viewing on all devices
name: Screenleap

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Shoptiques**

Founded in 2012 and based in New York City, Shoptiques is an innovative e-commerce platform that allows you to shop from local boutiques worldwide—all from the comfort of your home. Think of it as your personal tour guide for boutique shopping, but without the hassle of hopping from store to store or getting lost in the city. Instead, Shoptiques aggregates styles from various boutiques, offering a curated selection of unique, fashion-forward items that you wouldn't typically find in major retail chains. 

Their mission? Well, it's simple: **"Shop the world's best local boutiques online."** This approach empowers small, independently-owned boutiques by providing them a platform to reach a broader audience, all while ensuring that each product is packed with care and love directly from the shop.

As part of Y Combinator's W12 cohort, Shoptiques embraces a unique niche within the e-commerce landscape, focusing not just on variety but on the quality and personality embedded in each piece. With a team of about 51 employees, they’re passionate about creating a seamless shopping experience.

The website is easy to navigate and loaded with categories ranging from clothing to accessories, shoes, and home goods. They even have sections dedicated to kids' and men's wear. Plus, for orders over $100, you can enjoy free shipping!

In addition to providing an online storefront, Shoptiques caters to social media-savvy consumers with active accounts on platforms like Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, and Pinterest, reinforcing their community-centric brand image.

**Check out their offerings and support local boutiques at [Shoptiques.com](http://shoptiques.com).**
headline: Shoptiques.com lets you shop the world's best local boutiques online.

generated_description:
### The Muse: A Values-Driven Career Platform

Founded in 2011 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W12, The Muse is a New York-based company helping over seven million monthly users navigate their careers. At its core, The Muse provides a values-based job search and hiring platform tailored to Gen Z and millennials. It connects job seekers with employers whose values, benefits, and workplace culture resonate with the candidates' professional needs.

#### Mission and Offerings
The Muse's mission is simple but powerful: to ensure that job matches are more than just skills and titles; they're about cultural fit and personal fulfillment. For job seekers, it’s about finding roles where they can thrive. For employers, The Muse provides a marketplace that streamlines hiring by presenting a diverse and authentic employer brand, ultimately leading to better retention rates.

Key features of The Muse include:

- **Job Listings**: A rich variety of career options ranging from account management to software engineering.
- **Company Insights**: In-depth profiles of companies that showcase their work culture, values, and environments.
- **Career Advice**: Resources and expert advice aimed at empowering job seekers through every stage of their journey.
- **Coaching Services**: Access to certified coaches who can assist with resume building, job strategies, and personal branding.

#### Team and Growth
With a dedicated team of about 60 employees, The Muse focuses on building a workplace culture that mirrors the values it promotes. This culture emphasizes inclusivity, development, and connection—important factors that reflect its commitment to fostering great workplace environments.

#### Current Landscape
As of now, The Muse operates as a multipurpose platform tagged with terms like ‘marketplace,’ ‘SaaS,’ and ‘recruiting.’ It continues to innovate within the job search landscape by blending technology with a humanistic approach, clarifying the search process for both job seekers and employers.

Through its commitment to values-driven hiring and job searching, The Muse stands as a beacon for those seeking a meaningful career path. By aligning personal and organizational values, it doesn’t just aim to fill positions—it aspires to transform the way work is perceived and experienced. Want to learn more or explore available roles? Check out [The Muse](http://themuse.com) today.
headline: The Muse is values-based job search & hiring for 7M+ monthly
name: The Muse

**Wave: Revolutionizing Mobile Money in Africa**

Founded in 2018 and part of Y Combinator’s Batch W12, Wave is shaking up the financial landscape in Africa with its innovative mobile money app. Headquartered in Dakar, Senegal, and boasting a team of 1,600 dedicated employees, Wave’s mission is clear: to provide an affordable and accessible financial infrastructure for African users.

At its core, Wave is all about simplicity and cost-effectiveness. The app allows users to deposit, withdraw, and pay bills for free, with the added benefit of sending money to anyone for just 1%. Whether you’re looking to buy airtime, protect your funds with top-notch security, or access instant customer support via their toll-free line, Wave has you covered.

What’s particularly commendable is Wave’s commitment to addressing the unique financial challenges faced by Africans. With a user-friendly approach, they’re tackling the barriers that many people encounter when trying to manage their money. This isn't just fintech; it’s fintech with heart.

The company is currently hiring, which speaks to its rapid growth and ambition. If you're interested in joining a dynamic team that's genuinely making a difference, check out their open positions [here](https://wave.com/en/careers/).

In a nutshell, Wave is not just a mobile money app; it’s a game changer for financial services in Africa. With their intuitive platform and low-cost transactions, they are setting a new standard for what mobile money can achieve. For more information, visit their website at [wave.com](https://wave.com).
headline: Mobile money app for Africa
name: Wave
